price: 31. De schaduw kan niet van enig nut zijn tegen de felle vlammen van het vuur.
arabic: لَّا ظَلِيلٖ وَلَا يُغۡنِي مِنَ ٱللَّهَبِ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: lā ẓalīlin walā yugh'nī mina al-lahabi
